item.description: I know we've eaten here before but I am craving some Indian food again. The last time we ate here, we had a great turn out and many people enjoyed the food. And at that time, they didn't serve alcohol but they had wine recommendations next to the menu items. That gave us a laugh! Let's see if they have their liquor license yet! I love their Chicken Tikka Masala and Chicken Vindaloo. This is a small restaurant so if you RSVP 'yes,' please show up. Our events usually fill up and you could be taking the seat of someone who would like to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: It's a small place. You can't miss us.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Let's go to Taj Majal again!
